title: Seoul Bike Messengers: Eui Ho Kim at Gig Courier
content:
Eui Ho Kim is one of the few bike messengers in South Korea. He started Gig Courier, the only bike messenger company in Seoul. Some days he finds it challenging but remembers his days riding for T-Serv in Tokyo and time spent as part of the Japanese messenger community, and looks forward to what can be created in Seoulâ€¦

The post Seoul Bike Messengers: Eui Ho Kim at Gig Courier appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
